trigger.match: ^\[(.*)\] Your light does UNBELIEVABLE things to (.*)\! \[(.*)\]$

muclient.script:
function autocast (value) if value == 1 then EnableTimer("autocastTimer", true) elseif value == 0 then EnableTimer("autocastTimer", false) end end
function displayautocasthelp() ColourNote( "red", "black", "+", "white", "black", "--------------------------------------------------------------------", "red", "black", "+" ) ColourNote( "white", "black", "|", "ghostwhite", "black", " Zakum's autocast Plugin ", "white", "black", "|" ) ColourNote( "red", "black", "+", "white", "black", "--------------------------------------------------------------------", "red", "black", "+" ) end
function OnPluginInstall() displayautocasthelp() end
